actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend for 1 year the suspension of the 120-percent criterion for State "on" and "off" indicators for purposes of the Federal-State Extended Enemployment Compensation Act of 1970.

summary.text: Extends from July 1, 1974, to July 1, 1975, the 120-percent criterion for State "on" and "off" indicators for purposes of the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 1 year the suspension of the 120-percent criterion for State "on" and "off" indicators for purposes of the Federal-State Extended Enemployment Compensation Act of 1970.
